title: Happy Marriage?!, Vol. 1
description: In order to help her father, Chiwa Takanashi agrees to an arranged marriage with the company president, Hokuto Mamiya--a man she doesn't know--at the request of Hokuto's grandfather. Chiwa believes the arrangement isn't binding, but her new partner seems to think otherwise. Can two strangers living together find their way to a happy marriage?!Reads R to L (Japanese Style) for mature audiences.
author: Maki Enj≈çji
